title: "Icy" font?
content:
This is my first ever post on this forum, so I'm not exactly sure what to do or how to say it...but here goes:

From my screen name, you can kind of tell I like icy things, and I've been searching for a font that would fit that somehow. However, I have not yet found one that was "sharp" and "cold" enough, reminiscient of ice and icicles and things like that, without looking evil. Any suggestions? Ideas?
author: Icy King of Nowhere

comments.content: [Arctic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416044709/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/henning-skibbe/arctic/) may be icy in name only but I think it's a terrific typeface.

Couple of threads on a similar theme

[http://typophile.com/node/13061](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416044709/http:/typophile.com/node/13061 "http://typophile.com/node/13061")

[http://typophile.com/node/13197](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416044709/http:/typophile.com/node/13197 "http://typophile.com/node/13197")

Tim
What about a typeface that leaves you cold? Something with zero warmth.
Now _that_ is a seriously wonderful font.
